CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 倾向于；往往会；照料；护理；招待；侍候；照顾；照料；管理；照管；易于；趋向；趋于；关照；看护；服侍；监护；导致；向着某方向发展

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 温柔的；柔软的；脆弱的；幼稚的；难对付的
提供，偿还；使…变嫩；是…变柔软
有偏见的，有倾向的；宣传性的
宣传性的；有支持某种立场的倾向

word_mean_info__list.difference: 通常指对无力自顾的婴儿、病人等进行照料或护理。
具体意义指耕耘、培育植物；抽象意义指培养兴趣或向往的理想事物。
指对孩子的关心、鼓励、供养及抚养其成长；也指鼓励、促进事物的增长与发展。
指出于责任心、博爱心而不是私人感情去对人或物进行照顾。

bilingual.source: These days we tend to call all creepy crawlies ‘bugs'.
bilingual.target: 现在我们倾向于称所有的爬虫为“虫子”。

bilingual.source: It might not be real because social media doesn't present and people tend to.
bilingual.target: 这可能不是真的，因为社交媒体不会展示，人们倾向于。

bilingual.source: Do you think many parents tend to pressure their children to get stable jobs instead of letting them pursue their own interests?
bilingual.target: 你认为许多父母倾向于给孩子施加压力，让他们找稳定的工作，而不是让他们追求自己的兴趣吗？

bilingual.source: Their views tend to be right wing.
bilingual.target: 他们的观点倾向于右翼。

bilingual.source: They tend to overspend on luxury items.
bilingual.target: 他们倾向于在奢侈品上超支。

bilingual.source: In the West, people tend to live independently.
bilingual.target: 在西方，人们更倾向于独立生活。

bilingual.source: Dove in foreign policy tend to favor negotiations.
bilingual.target: 鸽派人物在外交政策上更倾向于谈判。

bilingual.source: Moderns tend to prefer urban living over rural living.
bilingual.target: 现代人倾向于喜欢城市生活而不是乡村生活。

bilingual.source: In casual conversation, people tend to elide certain words.
bilingual.target: 在随意的对话中，人们倾向于省略某些词。

bilingual.source: People tend to gravitate towards others who share similar interests.
bilingual.target: 人们往往倾向于与有相似兴趣的人在一起。

yingyinNormal.en: No, it would just freak him out. Listen, before we leave, I should warn you, I'm a passionate man and I tend towards public displays of affection.
yingyinNormal.zh: 才不咧，那会吓坏他的，听着，在出发之前，我要警告你，我是个热情的男人，倾向于公开地表达我炙热的感情。

yingyinNormal.en: My hypotheses tend to have that effect.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的假设就是想有这种效果。

yingyinNormal.en: Rising malpractice rates tend to sharpen the mind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 提高医疗事故保险金会让他们头脑更敏感。

yingyinNormal.en: They tend to be social outcasts, educationally subnormal. No, no, no, no, no, no.
yingyinNormal.zh: 通常被社会排斥，受教育程度低。不不不。

yingyinNormal.en: Those who can stand, tend to the wounded and those who have strength left, follow me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有受伤的人照顾好病人，有力气的人都跟我走。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies》

yingyinNormal.en: Look, when I've been drinking, sometimes I tend to get overly friendly, and I'm sorry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我喝了酒以后，有时候会变得太热情，对不起。

yingyinNormal.en: What are your thoughts on this, and do you tend to sleep better or worse, with a partner?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你怎么想呢？和另一半一起睡，你会睡得比较好，还是比较差呢？

yingyinNormal.en: They don't want me to shop there. They tend to make it difficult for you. Not for you, but for us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们不愿意让我在那里买东西，他们会故意刁难人，不是针对你，是针对我们。

yingyinNormal.en: There is a difference between looking away and looking to. I tend to notice these things. I'm sure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看向某个东西和移开视线是有区别的。我能注意到。我相信。

yingyinNormal.en: I tend to play shoot-them-ups. The indie games don't really interest me. I need adrenaline and action.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我经常玩清版射击游戏，对独立游戏并不感兴趣。我需要刺激与战斗。

yingyinNormal.en: Great, Michael. Whenever you find something interesting, we all tend to make money. What stock are you valuing?
yingyinNormal.zh: 很好，迈克尔，每次你发现有趣的事，我们都赚钱了，你在估值哪只股票？

yingyinNormal.en: What is your name? Mr. Peter Abernathy. Mr. Abernathy, what are your drives? Tend to my herd. Look after my wife.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你叫什么名字？彼得·艾伯纳西先生。艾伯纳西先生，你的目标是什么？照料我的牲口，照顾我的妻子。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, the cowboys are real, and they tend real cattle, but this is the modern-day prairie. Not a blade of grass in sight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 牛仔是真实的，他们也真的养了牛，但这是现代化的草原，不是长满青草的平原。

yingyinNormal.en: Each viewing the transaction not as the same thing they give and get, but focus more on what they tend to give up in the transaction.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们并不是把一个交易看成他们将买到或卖出什么，而更多地把注意力集中在这次交易中他们将失去什么。

yingyinNormal.en: Just try to resist giving him sleeping pills, if possible. They tend to make him a little bit, you know, irritable. No, more irritable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是尽量别给他安眠药，那会使变得他有点，暴躁，应该说，更暴躁。

yingyinNormal.en: I like this girl, okay, I seriously like this girl, you now how sometimes I tend get a little defended and quipy... Get out! No! Please!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我喜欢她，我真的很喜欢她，你们也晓得，有时我会以取笑别人来保护自己。少来了，不会啦。

yingyinNormal.en: I would tend to agree. Well, when you argued so passionately about a merger, Diane, I made a couple of calls and discovered a possible suitor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我同意你为合并积极建言时，戴安，我打了几个电话，发现了个可能的合并人选。

yingyinNormal.en: So when you're that big and powerful with over 160 cities in China with a million or more people, you tend to kind of turn inward and be complacent.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，当你在160个城市一百万或更多的人口中有影响力，你就知足常乐了。

yingyinNormal.en: Languages actually spoken by living people do not exist in neatly divided categories, but tend to transition gradually, crossing borders and classifications.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正在被人类使用的语言不存在严格的种类划分，而是逐渐过渡，跨越界限和分类。

yingyinNormal.en: Overall, behaviors that are perceived as being less frequent are also the ones that people tend to weigh more heavily when forming and updating impressions, highly immoral actions and highly competent actions.
yingyinNormal.zh: 总的来说，在形成以及更新印象时，人们对不太常出现的行为，印象会比较深刻，或是非常不道德的行为，还有非常令人满意的行为的时候。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 温柔的；亲切的；温情的；慈爱的；嫩的；柔软的；脆弱的；敏感的；年轻的；微妙的
n. 趋势；趋向；倾向；政治社团

word_family.mean: v. 有某种倾向；往往会；照顾；照料；照管；护理；趋向；趋于；管理；易于

sense_info_list.en: be likely to do something or happen in a particular way because this is what often or usually happens

examination_example.sentence: We <highlight>tend</highlight> to think that friends and family members are our biggest sources of connection, laughter, and warmth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们往往会认为，朋友和家人是我们构建人际关系、获得欢乐与温暖的最大来源。

examination_example.sentence: When we feel panicky, we <highlight>tend</highlight> to talk louder and faster.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们感到惊慌失措时，我们说话往往会更大声，且语速会更快。

examination_example.sentence: When our brains switch between being focused and unfocused on a task, they <highlight>tend</highlight> to be more efficient.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们的大脑在专注和不专注于一项任务之间切换时，它们往往更有效率。

sense_info_list.en: take a particular direction or often have a particular quality

examination_example.sentence: It can be inferred from Paragraph 3 that Americans <highlight>tend</highlight> to think that retirement may cause problems for them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从第三段可以推断，美国人倾向于认为退休可能会给他们带来问题。

examination_example.sentence: Parents and teachers <highlight>tend</highlight> to be still set in the degree mindset.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 家长和老师仍然倾向于用学位的思维定势。

word_usage.usage: tend表示“照顾；照料”时，作及物动词，其后可接名词或代词，如：tend her husband，；也可用于被动结构表示“倾向于；往往会”时，作不及物动词，常与介词to/towards连用，如：tend to make mistakes

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 温柔的；亲切的；温情的；慈爱的；嫩的；柔软的；脆弱的；敏感的；年轻的；微妙的
n. 趋势；趋向；倾向；政治社团

word_family.mean: v. 有某种倾向；往往会；照顾；照料；照管；护理；趋向；趋于；管理；易于

sense_info_list.en: frequently behave in a particular way

examination_example.sentence: Grass-fed beef production <highlight>tends</highlight> to be more labor-intensive as well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 草饲牛肉的生产往往也需要更多的劳动力。

examination_example.sentence: Not only that, but when people faced no consequences for dishonesty, their falsehoods <highlight>tended</highlight> to get even more sensational.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不仅如此，当他们并未因撒谎而受到惩罚时，他们的谎言就会变得更加耸人听闻。

examination_example.sentence: No one really knows how many different faces someone can recall, for example, but various estimates <highlight>tend</highlight> to hover in the thousands.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，没有人真正知道一个人能回忆起多少张不同的脸，但各种估计值往往徘徊在数千张左右。

sense_info_list.en: be likely to do something or happen in a particular way because this is what often or usually happens

examination_example.sentence: What do we learn about the possible reason why women <highlight>tend</highlight> to live longer?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于女性更长寿的可能原因，我们了解到了什么？

examination_example.sentence: They know that women <highlight>tend</highlight> to have longer life spans, living on average six years longer than men.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们知道女性的寿命更长，平均寿命比男性长6年。

examination_example.sentence: The value of drawing <highlight>tends</highlight> to be overestimated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 绘画的价值往往被高估了。

sense_info_list.en: take a particular direction or often have a particular quality

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 温柔的；亲切的；温情的；慈爱的；嫩的；柔软的；脆弱的；敏感的；年轻的；微妙的
n. 趋势；趋向；倾向；政治社团

word_family.mean: v. 有某种倾向；往往会；照顾；照料；照管；护理；趋向；趋于；管理；易于

sense_info_list.en: be likely to do something or happen in a particular way because this is what often or usually happens

examination_example.sentence: Alzheimer's patients <highlight>tend</highlight> to watch television more than 3 hours a day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阿尔茨海默病患者每天看电视的时间往往超过 3 小时。

examination_example.sentence: We'll all get the kids to build a small boat. We are all going to learn about X, Y, and Z. That <highlight>tends</highlight> to be one form of project-based learning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们都让孩子造小船吧。我们都学习某某吧。这往往是项目学习法的形式之一。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>tend</highlight> to drive responsibly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们倾向于负责任地驾驶。

sense_info_list.en: take a particular direction or often have a particular quality

examination_example.sentence: What might the man <highlight>tend</highlight> to buy with payment apps?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 男人倾向于用支付应用程序购买什么？

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>tend</highlight> to decline in people's later years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们往往在人们的晚年衰落。

examination_example.sentence: What do many people <highlight>tend</highlight> to think of innovation?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很多人倾向于如何看待创新？

sense_info_list.en: frequently behave in a particular way

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>tend</highlight> to be more open in interpersonal relationships.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在人际关系上往往更开放。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>tend</highlight> to start their careers and family at the same age.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们往往在相同的年龄步入职场、组建家庭。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 温柔的；亲切的；温情的；慈爱的；嫩的；柔软的；脆弱的；敏感的；年轻的；微妙的
n. 趋势；趋向；倾向；政治社团

word_family.mean: v. 有某种倾向；往往会；照顾；照料；照管；护理；趋向；趋于；管理；易于

sense_info_list.en: frequently behave in a particular way

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>tend</highlight> to be healthier physically and mentally.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们往往在身体和精神上更健康。

examination_example.sentence: Just as importantly, we <highlight>tend</highlight> to associate air with health care.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同样重要的是，我们往往将空气与医疗保健联系起来。

examination_example.sentence: Readers also <highlight>tended</highlight> to share articles that were exciting or funny, but not articles that left them merely sad.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 读者也趋向于分享令人快乐和兴奋的文章，但是不愿意分享只让他们难过的文章。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: frequently behave in a particular way

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>tend</highlight> to go back to bed on their own and won’t remember it in the morning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们往往会自己回去睡觉，然后早上起来就不记得了。

examination_example.sentence: When we are talking to someone, we <highlight>tend</highlight> to change someone else’s mind to our way of thinking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们与人交谈时，我们往往会改变别人的想法使其遵循我们的思维方式。

examination_example.sentence: It’s a difficult job, especially for a kid with homework and Boy Scouts and friendships to <highlight>tend</highlight> to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一个困难的工作，特别是对于一个有家庭作业，需要照料童子军以及友谊的孩子。
